# ciscosecureaccess_group (Data Source)

Data source for retrieving Cisco Secure Access groups

## Example Usage

```terraform
# A list of identities that match the string "devengineer"
data "ciscosecureaccess_group" "test_groups" {
  filter = "TestGroup1"
}

output "group_out" {
  value = [for s in data.ciscosecureaccess_group.test_groups.groups : s.label]
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `filter` (String) Filter string used to search for groups

### Read-Only

- `groups` (Attributes List) List of Cisco Secure Access groups corresponding to filter (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--groups))

<a id="nestedatt--groups"></a>
### Nested Schema for `groups`

Read-Only:

- `id` (Number) Unique ID of group
- `label` (String) Name of group
- `type` (String) Type of group
